item.title: Compiler hep realy easy but cant figure out
item.dc:creator: @popup popup
item.description:
@popup wrote:

ok so original compiler is

@echo off
title rs2hd compiler
echo Preparing…
mkdir bin
cd src
copy log4j.xml …
cd …
move log4j.xml bin/
echo Compiling nets…
“C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/net/.java
echo Compiling models…
“C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/model/.java
echo Compiling packet handlers…
“C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/.java
echo Compiling utils…
“C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/.java
echo Compiling shops…
“C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/content/Shops.java
“C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.7.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/content/ShopHandler.java
echo Complete.
pause

i need to change it to jdk 7.0 how am i going to do that
